text: "Still Holding On" is a 1997 duet by country singers Clint Black and Martina McBride. It was taken from his seventh studio album Nothin' but the Taillights and her fourth studio album Evolution and was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1998. It topped the Canadian Country Tracks and made number 11 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts. ==References== Category:1997 songs Category:Country songs Category:Clint Black songs Category:Martina McBride songs
title: Still Holding On
